widget.emptyDescription: Unfortunately, right now there are no approachable payment methods. Please try again later.
widget.emptyBankListContent: We support many banks in dozens of countries, but there may be exceptions. Please, try another payment method if you didnâ€™t find your bank or country.
widget.expiredContent: This link was not used in time and has been deactivated for security reasons. You can ask your counterpart to update the link.

result.processingText: Your payment is being processed. We will notify you once the payment is complete.
result.succeededText: Thank you! Payment was successfully completed
result.errorText: An unexpected error occured while paying. Please try again later or choose another payment method.
result.canceledText: The payment has been declined by the provider. Please make sure that selected account is active and has sufficient funds for the current transaction.
